scripts.minify: npm run minify:css && npm run minify:js
scripts.build: npm run optimize:images && npm run minify
scripts.dev: echo 'Development server - just open index.html in browser'
scripts.help:
echo '
Available commands:
  npm run minify:css      - Minify CSS files
  npm run minify:js       - Minify JS files
  npm run minify          - Minify CSS + JS
  npm run watch           - Watch CSS/JS changes and auto-minify
  npm run optimize:images - Generate optimized image variants (AVIF, WebP, JPEG)
  npm run build           - Build for production (images + CSS + JS)
'
